Name: Mexica
Ingredients: 20 ml Tangerine / Mandarin / Clementine juice (fresh juice)
Instructions:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. Special Ingredient #1: Homemade dill syrup
Add 160 grams of dill to 1 litre sugar syrup. Allow to infuse for at least 24 hours, strain and bottle.
Review: Created by Cihan Anadologlu, co-owner of Circle By Cihan Anadologlu in Munich, for Patrón Tequila at London Cocktail Week 2016.
